content: X-U 15 P8 TH Steel nails Single nail for fastening to steel using powder-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed to improve productivity Recommended for use on hard steel base material Stepped and knurled shank for the highest application limit Highest hardness to penetrate hard materials without bending Screw effect for a secure hold and high loading capacity on steel Applications Tacking of composite deck in steel ≥ 6 mm Tagging labels Fastenings to steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (concrete): 80 mm Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 1/4 in Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (concrete) | 80 mm | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 1/4 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Washer size | 5/16 in | Point type | Ballistic point, knurled | Approvals | COLA, ICC-ES | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 5, DX 6 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 342215 - Premium fastener X-U 15 P8TH bulk - Package Size 1000 pc - 3496907 - Kit X-U 15 P8TH+6.8/11 M Bulk Red - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Premium fastener X-U 15 P8TH bulk - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal red - 3496908 - Kit X-U 15 P8TH+6.8/11 M C-T Yellow - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Premium fastener X-U 15 P8TH bulk - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal yellow - 3505356 - Kit X-U 15 P8TH + 6.8/11 M G - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Premium fastener X-U 15 P8TH bulk - 1000x Cartridge 6.8/11 M .27 cal green bulk - 3808064 - KIT X-U 15 P8TH+6.8/11 M10T TITANIUM - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Premium fastener X-U 15 P8TH bulk - 1000x DX Cartridge 6,8/11 M10-X10 T titanium Bulk
